name: Talonflame
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

abilities.name: Gale Wings
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down as your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aero Blitz
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
